Title: For Trisket, a Task Kit
Description:
I have many valued customers, but Trisket is one of my favorites. Most recently he came to me because his herbalist's pouch has worn out. 

I offered to make him a selection of baskets to replace his old pouch. 

Would you help me with these tasks, $p? Trisket would be appreciative.
ObjectivesText: Craft 2 Herbalist's Floral Baskets for Hideshaper Koruz in Valdrakken.
